text: Overall my friends and I had a great experience during our stay in NYC. Gabriel and Leo were not only warm and kind but also approachable whenever we needed help. The location was good; we pretty much visited places just by walking, and there are quite a few nice restaurants nearby. The apartment is same as the description and the photos attached, very lovely and neat!
title: MODERN LUXURY 2BED/2BA LOFT_MIDTOWN
